snippet: Buyers now expect their cars to have the capabilities of their smartphones, so automakers have complied. To gauge the systems, we spent time with five cars from automakers in the forefront of telematics.
abstract: Consumers expect their cars to have the capabilities of their smartphones, so automakers have to offer a panoply of services and gadgets, commonly called telematics, that ideally keep pace with Silicon Valley.
lead_paragraph: Buyers now expect their cars to have the capabilities of their smartphones, so automakers have complied. To gauge the systems, we spent time with five cars from automakers in the forefront of telematics.
